title: New system to help bronzies and low silveries to improve
body:
Upon demotion to bronze or placement in bronze, they are required to enter a 12 hour trial at their given time of interest, they will need to join a skype call with military officers and talk with them about the game, if they are caught guilty of using an elo booster the military blows up their house.

Once in the program they have to play srs and do their best, if they make too many errors during the trial the officers inform them of a miniature nuclear bomb heading for their property, and if they can make it out in time they will be given access to the game, if they do manage to get out and start playing again, but make too many mistakes an assault squad surrounds their house and does the dirty deed. 

imo this would be very effective way for bronzies and silveries to get better
